heading: HB08855
0: AN ACT REGULATING HABAL-HABAL AND OTHER MOTORCYCLE SERVICES
status: Pending with the Committee on TRANSPORTATION since 2019-01-23
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08855
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REGULATING HABAL-HABAL AND OTHER MOTORCYCLE SERVICES
ABSTRACT : Seeks to amend R.A.No.4136, Sec.7(c) to grant the Land Transportation Franchising and Regulatory Board ("LTFRB") regulatory powers over motorcycles and other similar two-wheeled vehicles. Proposes that Motorcycles may be registered either as private vehicle or as public utility vehicle
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CAMPOS, LUIS JR. N
DATE FILED : 2019-01-21
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION ON 2019-01-23
